thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Dominic Solanke is ready to join Liverpool in a stunning summer switch
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Dominic Solanke is ready to join Liverpool in a stunning summer switch

author: jgordon
title: Chelsea transfer news: Dominic Solanke is ready to join Liverpool in a stunning summer switch
text:
i'M JUR MAN Chelsea transfer news: Dominic Solanke is ready to join Liverpool in a stunning summer switch 
England Under-21 international star will reject interest from Celtic to become part of Jurgen Klopp’s plans Exclusive Comments CHELSEA starlet Dominic Solanke is ready to join Liverpool in a stunning summer switch. 
The 19-year-old striker has told pals he is Anfield-bound when his Stamford Bridge deal expires at the end of the season. Corbis 3 Dominic Solanke wanted £50,000 per week to stay at Chelsea despite barely featuring in the first team 
England Under-21 international star Solanke will reject interest from Celtic to become part of Jurgen Klopp’s plans. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Chelsea news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Liverpool face paying up to £8million in compensation as the teenager’s fee will go to a tribunal. 
They did the same when Danny Ings arrived out-of-contract from Burnley 18 months ago when he ran down his contract at Turf Moor. 
Chelsea have not made a breakthrough in contract talks with one of the biggest talents in the country, who was asked to train with the England senior squad two years ago under Roy Hodgson. Related Stories Young charges Reece Oxford, Josh Sims, Dominic Solanke, Marcus Edwards... seven wonderkids set for a breakthrough year in 2017 to keep your eye on So long Solanke? Chelsea's academy star Dominic Solanke could leave to Premier League rivals as contract talks stall DOM-INATING England U20s 4 Iran U20s 1: Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke bags a brace in Four Nations tournament Shed heaven Ike Ugbo is Chelsea's new goal-a-game teen striker... but can he cut it at Stamford Bridge? Wage war Chelsea youngster Dominic Solanke holding Blues to astonishing £50,000-a-week wages ransom 
Solanke wanted a £50,000-a-week deal to stay at Chelsea but failing to agree fresh terms has alerted top clubs in the Premier League. 
Liverpool are unlikely to meet his salary demands from earlier in the season but can offer being part of Klopp’s future as he shapes a squad to fight for the title every season. Chelsea youngster Solanke is set to join Liverpool where he will be handed a shot at first-team football Getty Images Solanke is a prolific England youth international Dominic Solanke goals and skills for SBV Vitesse 
Daniel Sturridge, who also made the move from Chelsea to Liverpool, is out of favour and there is room for a striker to fight his way into Klopp’s plans. 
Ex-Kop boss Brendan Rodgers has shown interest in taking Solanke and offering him a chance to shine in Glasgow like Moussa Dembele this season. 
But the Scottish giants cannot match Liverpool in terms of a package offered. Liverpool 2-0 Tottenham : Liverpool win for the first time this year
